properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 15 at 2:40PM PST until February 17 at 2:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Rough bar conditions expected.
- GENERAL SEAS...9 ft easing to 7 ft Saturday evening.
Seas build again toward 10 ft with, and following, the
Sunday late morning ebb.

- FIRST EBB...Around 10 PM Saturday. Seas to 9 ft.

- SECOND EBB...Around 1045 AM Sunday. Seas to 12 ft.

* WHERE...In the Main Channel of the Columbia River Bar.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 4 PM PST this
afternoon. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 6 AM Sunday to 2
AM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft
especially when navigating in or near harbor entrances.
properties.instruction:
Small craft should use extreme caution when navigating in or near
harbor entrances.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SUNDAY TO 2 AM PST MONDAY
